elementName.description: The name of a template. Element name is unique for a WABAs namespace.

languageCode.description: Language code for the template. Refer to all the language codes here.

content.description: The body of the template. Character limit: 1028. For Authentication category the first line should be - {{1}} is your verification code
content.example: The place for the event is kothrud,Pune

category.description: The category of your template. Possible values are AUTHENTICATION, MARKETING and UTILITY.If you submit the templates with the any other categories, you will receive an error Invalid category provided, kindly use category from these option AUTHENTICATION, MARKETING, UTILITY

example.example: The place for the event is kothrud,Pune

allowTemplateCategoryChange.description: Boolean value. If True, Meta will automatically update the category of the template as per the template content. Default value is False

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Your app token, please refer [**Get access token api**](https://docs.gupshup.io/reference/get_partner-app-appid-token) to get the token from partner documentation.

containerMeta.example: {"appId":"a41b30f4-d202-4fdb-911e-3a8fbfbfb797","data":"The place for the event is kothrud,Pune","footer":"This is footer","sampleText":"The place for the event is kothrud,Pune","enableSample":true,"editTemplate":false,"allowTemplateCategoryChange":true,"addSecurityRecommendation":false}

data.example: The place for the event is kothrud,Pune This is footer

meta.example: {"example":"The place for the event is kothrud,Pune"}
